levels.description:
When active, automatically launches a <@ba.vup>Self-Driving Cart</> in the direction this unit is deployed, and every Cart consumes <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP; this skill can be toggled off to disable the automatic launching
<@ba.rem>After launching, the Self-Driving Cart moves in a straight line until it runs into impassable area. When passing a Self-Driver One-Way Road or a friendly unit, it will change its direction according to that unit's deployment direction (Once per unit)</>
